entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
